data: One of the first and most important things you will learn about AI
is that it runs on data. Without data, AI is nothing. Data comes
in many shapes and sizes and in the real world is rarely neatly organized,
unless someone else has already organized it.
AI needs data because that is what it learns from. If you think about it
we all need data in order to learn. Learning math required you to listen
(auditory data) and watch (visual data) a teacher explain it to you. Even now
you are consuming the textual data of this tutorial to learn about AI! [WIP]
